title: I Count 100 Things
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 65 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 150L
description: I Count 100 Things explores ways in which common items such as gumdrops and marshmallows can be manipulated into different objects, such as a rainbow and an igloo. Pictures and repetitive text support the early reader.
reviewWords: count, gumdrops, igloo, marshmallow, paperclips, rainbow
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Rhyme                : Identify and write words that rhyme with make
grammar: Exclamation Marks                : Recognize the purpose of an exclamation point for punctuation and expression
wordWork: Compound Words                : Identify and segment compound words
